alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 2:50PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Francis, southwestern Crittenden and southeastern Cross Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 250 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madison, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Hughes, Madison, Village Creek State Park, Widener, Anthonyville, Jennette, Simsboro, New Home, Kate, Cottonwood Corner, Browns, Jonquil, New Castle, Tarsus, Round Pond, Blackfish, Neuhardt, Democrat and Kinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
